name: Cloneagheddon
description:
Background

_______________________

You play as a hyper-intelligent cannibal that masters the art of cloning. Upon creating your clone army you realize that they have inherited your recreational habit of consuming live humans. Unfortunately however, they have decided that you are looking rather delicious. You decide to entertain this bit of sport for a while as you are also rather hungry and agree that your life is indeed, quite the delicacy.

How To Play

____________________

* Eliminate clones either with melee or your ranged attack.

* Eat / collect corpses and take them to a furnace to turn your clone bodies into live ammunition! (Beware that furnaces take a while to recharge after you use them. Use this ammo wisely or you'll be left with just your melee.

* Don't let those nasty impostors touch you! You are far too delicious!

* Survive for as long as possible while killing as many clones as you can.

Controls

____________________

Quit:  ALT-F4 or cut the power cable behind your PC.

Shoot:  Left Mouse button.

Melee:  Right Mouse button.

Eat  Corpses: Space Bar.
